articles.title: Maharashtra: BJP wins 3 of 6 Rajya Sabha seats in major setback to ruling MVA alliance
articles.description: In a huge setback for Maharashtra's ruling Maha Vikas Aghadi, BJP won the third seat in a straight fight against Shiv Sena. Out of 6 Rajya Sabha seats in the state, BJP & MVA won 3 seats each.
articles.content: In a huge setback for Maharashtra's ruling Maha Vikas Aghadi, BJP won the third seat in a straight fight against Shiv Sena. Out of 6 Rajya Sabha seats in the state, BJP & MVA won 3 seats each.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: 2nd ODI: Azam, Haq, Nawaz star in Pakistan's 10th series win over WI
articles.description: Skipper Babar Azam and opener Imam-ul-Haq hit steady half centuries before spinner Mohammad Nawaz recorded his best figures as Pakistan beat the West Indies by 120 runs in the second ODI in Multan on Friday.
articles.content:
Delighted to put my part in another series victory. Will remember this spell for many reasons. Thank you Multan https://t.co/5ZJnUIhjJh
— Muhammad Nawaz (@mnawaz94) 1654891751000

articles.description: महाराष्ट्र से राज्यसभा की छह सीट पर चुनाव के लिए शुक्रवार वोटिंग हुई। आरोप-प्रत्यारोप के बीच चुनाव आयोग की ओर से देर रात मतगणना शुरू किए जाने की अनुमति चुनाव आयोग की ओर से दी गई। जो नतीजे आए उसमें बीजेपी के सभी तीन उम्मीदवार जीत दर्ज करने में कामयाब हुए।

articles.description: ATF accounts for 40% of an airline’s expense. Its price has increased every fortnight since the start of this calendar year till last month, when it hit a record high.

articles.title: US stocks crushed after inflation hits 40-year high
